message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $180 is a bit steep for me. How about $140?  I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $180 might be a bit high for you. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $160.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $160 is still a bit higher than my budget. How about $150? It's fair to both of us, and I'm confident this product will be worth it.
Bob, I understand your concerns, but I've already compromised a lot. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $155.
